title: Tombstone Metadata
description: Metadata contains information on why, when and by whom a digital object was tombstoned

@type.description: The type of the record, in this case a ods:Tombstone

ods:tombstoneDate.description: Timestamp the Digital Object was tombstoned and no longer active. Following the ISO Date Time Format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX

ods:tombstoneText.description: A reason why the Digital Object was tombstoned
examples: This is a duplicate of XXX
This object was made by mistake

ods:hasAgents.description: The agent(s) who tombstoned the Digital Object, contains an ods:Agent object

ods:hasRelatedPIDs.description: The PIDs of the object the tombstoned object is related to

@type.description: The type of the object, in this case a ods:RelatedPID

dcterms:identifier.description: The PID of the related object, used in cases of `ods:Annotation`, `ods:DigitalMedia` and `ods:DigitalSpecimen`

schema:identifier.description: The PID of the related object, used in cases of `ods:DataMapping`, `ods:SourceSystem` and `ods:MachineAnnotationService`

ods:relationshipType.description: The type of relationship between the tombstoned object and the related object
